I'm Brady and I'm interested in compelling data visualisation.
I specialise in biophysics & molecular animation, and created the [Molecular Nodes](https://bradyajohnston.github.io/MolecularNodes) add-on for Blender to help myself and others create easier and better molecular animations.

I'm a self taught coder & 3D-artist, having picked up both during my PhD in structural biology & biophysics, and now teach others the same on my [YouTube Channel](https://youtube.com/c/bradyjohnston).

Check out my 2022 Blender conference talk on exactly these topics!
